name: OxygenSaturationInBlood
title: Oxygen Saturation in Blood
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable term codes for Oxygen Saturation in Blood.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to discover or request blood Oxygen Saturation level in clinical records.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes laboratory LOINC encoded observable terms representing Oxygen Saturation in Blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Laboratory LOINC encoded terms that do not represent Oxygen Saturation in Blood.)
